text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since Jul 9?
I've created a design template for the home page and a style guide for the rest. I've also created go and <http://sep.net|sep.net> server templates.
attachments.text: I've created a design template for the home page and a style guide for the rest. I've also created go and <http://sep.net|sep.net> server templates.
attachments.title: What did you do since Jul 9?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today I'll be quite busy, but I might be able too create design for logon and sign up
